About Us

Land Transport

C2C Logistics offers our customers the truckload and less-than-truckload (LTL) services they require for their local and domestic shipments. These services are dependable and effective.

Full Time Load

Full truck loads are almost always the fastest and safest option to move heavy freight. This is true because only during loading and unloading will the goods be handled, and they will be on a specific vehicle.

Part Time Load

PTL makes it simple to transport various items of clients in one vehicle. This enables numerous shippers to split their load and pay for the specific area that they occupy, making it an affordable way to move products.

Cargo Storage

The top logistic company in India, C2C Logistic India, provides a wide selection of tech-based warehousing solutions that are all 100% customised to match the unique demands of your company.

The Best And Faster Logistic Service

We are a trusted logistics partner that provides customized solutions to meet your unique business needs. With years of experience in the industry, we have established ourselves as a reliable and efficient logistics provider. Our staff at C2C Logistics will organise every aspect of each road shipment, from the optimal route to the required vehicle.

With the use of readily available vehicles of all sizes and forms, we can deliver anything from small courier vans to low loaders, tail lift trucks, box and curtain-sided vehicles, and skeleton trucks that can carry especially huge or odd items.

Our Mission

Our mission is to simplify your logistics, allowing you to focus on growing your business. We are committed to providing the highest level of customer service and satisfaction, and we stand behind every shipment we handle. Our team of logistics experts is dedicated to delivering your goods safely, securely, and on time, every time.

Our Vission

To establish a reputation for being the most trustworthy and respected logistics service provider in the world by providing a variety of services across the logistics portfolio, including aggregator, real estate infrastructure, technology, and BPM services.
